name: Pumpkin Seeds with Cinnamon and Salt
author: ALISONINONTARIO
summary: This is a nice twist to pumpkin seeds. Every year I host a pumpkin carve and make this variety of pumpkin seeds, and everyone goes wild for the cinnamon flavor with the salt. Use the seasonings to taste--the amounts really depend upon how many seeds you get from your pumpkins.
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease a cookie sheet and spread the seeds out in an even layer
Lightly sprinkle with salt and cinnamon
Bake for about 5 minutes, then stir the seeds
Season with salt and cinnamon again
Continue baking, stirring occasionally, for about 20 minutes, or until seeds are toasted
